task: Explore the "热榜" section to view popular content.
task_end_condition: The task is known to be completed when fufu has scrolled through the list of hot topics and engaged with at least one of the trending topics.

working_memory.description: Touch on a button that has text "热榜"

By touching the button with the text "热榜," the main screen now displays information related to personal data protection guidelines and user rights on the platform, along with options to read detailed policies and make decisions.
Navigating back from the previous screen has replaced multiple textviews with buttons, specifically adding a "已有账号，一键登录" button and a "跳过" button on the current screen.
Touch on a button that has text "跳过"

By touching the "跳过" button, the screen now includes a new button with the text "关注" and additional content related to different topics like "科学," "心理," "影视," and more. The selected textview now displays "娱乐" instead of "推荐."
Touch on a button that has content_desc "科学"

The actions taken by fufu have deviated from the main task of exploring the "热榜" section to view popular content. fufu needs to explore the "热榜" section by directly interacting with the widget labeled "热榜" to view popular content.
Touch on a button that has content_desc "科学"
